org.wso2.identity.asgardeo.tag.service.api.rest.v1.core

Class TagManagementAPIService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.identity.asgardeo.tag.service.api.rest.v1.core.TagManagementAPIService

  • public class TagManagementAPIService
extends Object
    Calls internal osgi services to perform tag management operations.
